column4: hello! are there any single-player text-only (like interactive fiction, not like rougelikes) RPGs ? at all? for linux? google is not being too helpfull..

but, something thats not a rougelike? I though something w more plot and stuff, and less killing; parser interface, room-by-room movement, ASK/TELL NPC conversations, literary descriptions instead of ASCII art
hm, i dont know of any
